summary: What everybody have been waiting so long. HD retexture of Dark Brotherhood armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][url=http://jpegshare.net/][center][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/fd/95/fd9530146eca228a7ceab1d223a25d28.png[/img][/center][/url]
[font=Georgia][color=#d0e0e3][i][size=4]Finally, I decided to do this retexture. DB armor model was hard enough to-do for me a few years ago. But now I understands how to make new textures 'from scratch'. This mod is contains ABSOLUTELY NEW, really high quality textures for DB armor. I did not change anything, I tried to make it vanilla-like and I managed to do this. 

I really hope that you will like it. And I'll be glad if you endorse this file, because I spent a lot of time and energy for this modification. Your comments and likes are the best reward for me. 
[/size]

[url=http://jpegshare.net/][center][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/20/b2/20b2831078f9fbe5aa160f11f53b0d39.png[/img][/center][/url][/i][/color][/font][url=https://flic.kr/p/S2UGif][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/595/32839436280_7fc18dee7f.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/SqsGEn][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/3/2941/33094644001_851251fb67.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/SnUpTo] [/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Rk9ubG][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/4/3924/32378150764_01b47c22ec.jpg[/img][/url]          [url=https://flic.kr/p/Rk9ubG]   [/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/S2WDcS][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/4/3833/32839816100_18d8dc7f51.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://jpegshare.net/][center][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/20/b2/20b2831078f9fbe5aa160f11f53b0d39.png[/img][/center][/url][font=Georgia][size=4][i]

[color=#d0e0e3]Many thanks to:[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1330055]betterbecause[/url] [color=#d0e0e3]for some textures from resource pack[/color]

[/i][/size][/font]
author: redtox
